title: Analyze Production Downtime Event
description: After an unplanned shutdown of an offshore platform, a production engineer analyzes the event to correctly categorize the cause and the amount of deferred production.

tasks.description: Identify the start and end time of the platform shutdown from the event log.
tasks.expected_outcome: The exact duration of the downtime is determined.

tasks.description: Determine the root cause of the shutdown by reviewing alarms and operator logs (e.g., 'Compressor Failure').
tasks.expected_outcome: The root cause is correctly identified and categorized.

tasks.description: Calculate the total volume of deferred production (oil and gas) by multiplying the downtime duration by the platform's normal production rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lost production volume is calculated and logged in the downtime tracking system.
